name: Flared pants
title: Women's Light-Wash High-Rise Flared Jeans
tagline: Flared pants with a high waist and dramatic leg shape, offering a flattering and trendy silhouette.
description: Add a touch of retro style to your wardrobe with these flared pants. Featuring a flattering high waist and a dramatic flared leg, these pants create an elongated silhouette, perfect for both casual and chic looks. Made from comfortable, stretchy fabric for all-day wear.

name: Blouson top
title: Pure Cotton Blouson Sleeve Relaxed Blouse
tagline: A stylish blouson top with a relaxed fit and gathered waist, offering a flattering and feminine silhouette.
description: Effortlessly stylish, this blouson top features a relaxed fit with a gathered waist and billowy sleeves for a flattering, feminine silhouette. Perfect for pairing with jeans or skirts, this versatile top adds a touch of elegance to any outfit.

name: Cotton pants
title: Women's Pure Cotton Trousers
tagline: Comfortable and breathable cotton pants, perfect for all-day wear with a relaxed fit and versatile style.
description: Stay comfortable and chic with these cotton trousers, crafted from breathable fabric for all-day ease. With a tailored fit and versatile design, they're perfect for both casual and polished looks. Pair with your favorite tops for effortless style.

name: Sleeveless kurta
title: Ethnic Motifs Printed Mandarin Collar Sleeveless A-Line Kurta
tagline: A breezy sleeveless kurta, offering a comfortable and stylish fit, perfect for casual or festive occasions.
description: Embrace effortless elegance with this sleeveless kurti, designed for warm days and a modern look. Featuring a comfortable, relaxed fit and crafted from lightweight fabric, it's perfect for both casual outings and festive occasions. Pair it with leggings or palazzos for a stylish, versatile ensemble.

name: Cotton shirt
title: Women's Regular Fit Checked Casual Shirt
tagline: A soft and breathable cotton shirt, designed for comfort and everyday style with a classic, versatile fit.
description: Stay classic and comfortable with this cotton plaid shirt. Made from soft, breathable fabric, it features a timeless plaid pattern and a relaxed fit, perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Ideal for casual days or a laid-back weekend look.

name: Flared kurta
title: Women's Indie Prints Georgette Anarkali Kurta
tagline: An elegant flared kurta with a graceful A-line silhouette, offering a perfect blend of comfort and style.
description: Add a touch of elegance to your wardrobe with this flared kurta. Featuring a graceful A-line silhouette, it combines comfort and style effortlessly. Crafted from soft, breathable fabric, this versatile piece is perfect for casual outings or festive occasions, offering both comfort and charm.

name: Accordian skirt
title: Accordion Pleats Maxi Flared Skirt
tagline: A chic accordion skirt with pleats that add movement and texture, perfect for both casual and dressy occasions.
description: Make a statement with this accordion skirt, featuring pleats that add texture and movement to your look. Crafted from lightweight, flowy fabric, this skirt offers a flattering silhouette and is perfect for both casual and dressy occasions. Pair with a tucked-in blouse or top for a chic, modern style.

name: Denim shorts
title: Women Pure Cotton High-Rise Denim Shorts
tagline: Classic denim shorts with a relaxed fit, offering comfort and style for casual, warm-weather days.
description: Stay cool and stylish with these denim shorts, featuring a classic fit and durable fabric for everyday comfort. With a versatile design, they're perfect for casual outings, beach days, or summer adventures. Pair with a t-shirt or tank top for an effortlessly laid-back look.
